Container.Name: sonarr-extended
Container.Overview: Radarr Extended: Sonarr (Develop Branch) with custom scripts to provide aditional functionality...
Container.Description: Radarr Extended: Sonarr (Develop Branch) with custom scripts to provide aditional functionality...

Config.Name: Enable AutoConfig Script
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enables AutoConfig script to run after startup and configure Radarr settings automatically using best practices...

Config.Name: Enable Recyclarr Script
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enables Recyclarr to autoconfigure Radarr with optimized profiles and CF's from Trash Guides

Config.Name: Enable Queue Cleaner Script
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enables QueueCleaner Script that automatically removes stuck downloads that cannot be automatically imported on a 15 minute interval

Config.Name: Enable Youtube Series Downloader Script
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enables Youtube-Series-Downloadder script to run every hour

Config.Name: Enable Extras Script
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enables Extras script to run during download import process

Config.Name: Extras Type
Config.Description: all or trailers :: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurette, etc...) :: trailers only downloads trailers

Config.Name: Extras Languages
Config.Description: Set the desired language for Extras, all languages will be processed... (this is a ',' separated list of TMDB language codes, get the code from there sites language opitons, example: en-US)

Config.Name: Extras Official Only
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Skips extras that are not considered/marked as Official from TMDB site.

Config.Name: Plex Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if PlexNotify.bash is used...

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: ONLY used if PlexNotify.bash is used...
